snippet: Stocks on Wall Street narrowly rose as a recent string of losing sessions sent investors looking for bargains.
abstract: Stock index futures fall sharply after JPMorgan Chase stuns investors with news that its chief investment office has incurred significant losses; JPMorgan shares plummet in after hours trading, dragging down listings across the entire banking sector.
lead_paragraph: Stocks on Wall Street narrowly rose as a recent string of losing sessions sent investors looking for bargains.

headline.main: Banks Suffer After-Hours On Word of Chase Losses
headline.print_headline: Banks Suffer After-Hours On Word of Chase Losses
